analyzed: sota avadhāne paññā suta maye ñāṇa
sutvāna savare paññā sīla maye ñāṇa
samādahane paññā samādhi bhāvanā āmaye ñāṇa
paccaya pariggahe paññā dhamma ṭṭhiti ñāṇa

original: Atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ dhammānaṁ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: atīta anāgata paccuppannānam dhammānam saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇa

original: Paccuppannānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: paccuppannānam dhammānam vipariṇāma anupassane paññā udaya bbaya anupassane ñāṇa

original: Ārammaṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: ārammaṇam paṭisaṅkhā bhaṅga anupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇa
muñcitu kamya tā paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhāra upekkhāsu ñāṇa
bahiddhā vuṭṭhāna vivaṭṭane paññā gotra bhuñāṇa
dubhataḥ vuṭṭhāna vivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇa
chinna vaṭuma anupassane paññā vimutti ñāṇa

original: Tadā samudāgate dhamme passane paññā paccavekkhaṇe ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: tadā samudāgate dhamme passane paññā paccavekkhaṇe ñāṇa
ajjhatta vavatthāne paññā vatthu nānatte ñāṇa
bahiddhā avatthāne paññā gocara nānatte ñāṇa
cariyā vavatthāne paññā cariyā anānatte ñāṇa
catu dhamma vavatthāne paññā bhūmi nānatte
nava dhamma vavatthāne paññā dhamma nānatte ñāṇa
attha nānatte paññā attha paṭisambhide ñāṇa
dhamma nānatte paññā dhamma paṭisambhide ñāṇa
nirutti nānatte paññā nirutti paṭisambhide ñāṇa
paṭibhāna nānatte paññā paṭibhāna paṭisambhide ñāṇa
vihāra nānatte paññā vihāra aṭṭhe ñāṇa
samāpatti nānatte paññā samāpatta ṭṭhe ñāṇa
vihāra samāpatti nānatte paññā vihāra samāpatta ṭṭhe ñāṇa
avikkhepa parisuddha ttā āsava samucchede paññā ānantarika samādhimhi

original: Dassanādhipateyyaṁ santo ca vihārādhigamo paṇītādhimuttatā paññā araṇavihāre ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: dassana ādhipateyyam santaḥ ca vihāra adhigamaḥ paṇīta adhimutta tā paññā araṇa vihāre ñāṇa

original: Dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṁ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi vasibhāvatā paññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: dvīhi balehi samannāgata ttā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇa cariyāhi navahi samādhi cariyāhi vasi bhāva tā paññā nirodha samāpattiyā ñāṇa
sampajānassa pavatta pariyādāne paññā parinibbāne ñāṇa

original: Sabbadhammānaṁ sammā samucchede nirodhe ca anupaṭṭhānatā paññā samasīsaṭṭhe ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: sabba dhammānam sammā samucchede nirodhe ca an upaṭṭhāna tā paññā sama sīsa ṭṭhe ñāṇa
puthu na ānatta teja pariyādāne paññā sallekha ṭṭhe ñāṇa
nānā dhamma ppakāsana tā paññā attha sandassane ñāṇa
sabba dhammānam eka saṅgaha tā anānatta ekatta paṭivedhe paññā dassana visuddhi ñāṇa

original: Kāyampi cittampi ekavavatthānatā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca adhiṭṭhānavasena ijjhanaṭṭhe paññā iddhividhe ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: kāyampi cittampi eka vavatthāna tā sukha saññañca lahu saññañca adhiṭṭhāna vasena ijjhanaṭṭhe paññā iddhi vidhe ñāṇa
vitakka vipphāra vasena nānatta ekatta sadda nimittānam pariyogāhaṇe paññā sota dhātu visuddhi ñāṇa

original: Tiṇṇannaṁ cittānaṁ vipphārattā indriyānaṁ pasādavasena nānattekattaviññāṇacariyā pariyogāhaṇe paññā cetopariyañāṇaṁ.
analyzed: tiṇṇannam cittānam vipphāra ttā indriyānam pasāda vasena nānatta ekatta viññāṇa cariyā pariyogāhaṇe paññā cetas pariya ñāṇa

original: Paccayappavattānaṁ dhammānaṁ nānattekattakammavipphāravasena pariyogāhaṇe paññā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: paccaya ppavattānam dhammānam nānatta ekatta kamma vipphāra vasena pariyogāhaṇe paññā pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇa
obhāsa vasena nānatta ekatta rūpa nimittānam dassana aṭṭhe paññā dibba cakkhu ñāṇa

original: Catusaṭṭhiyā ākārehi tiṇṇannaṁ indriyānaṁ vasibhāvatā paññā āsavānaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: ākārehi tiṇṇannam indriyānam vasibhāvatā paññā āsavānam khaye ñāṇa
indriya para upari yat ta ñāṇa

original: Imesaṁ tesattatiyā ñāṇānaṁ sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni sāvakasādhāraṇāni;
analyzed: imesam tesattatiyāḥ ñāṇānam sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni sāvaka sādhāraṇāni
